timeline.bodyText:
The namespace is just consistent with the namespace used in the other helm commands in this doc.
The name of the operator image could be more generic, not sure what is the format used to document.  The problem  with giving a tag is that every time we have a new version of the operator we need to change documentation.
timeline.author: mriccell
